summary.long: 2 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text:
From the church leader.
To the chosen lady and her children, whom I love because we share the truth. I’m not the only one who loves you. Everyone who knows the truth also loves you.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We love you because of the truth which lives in us and will be with us forever.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Good will, mercy, and peace will be with us. They come from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, who in truth and love is the Father’s Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I was very happy to find some of your children living in the truth as the Father has commanded us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear lady, I’m now requesting that we continue to love each other. It’s not as though I’m writing to give you a new commandment. Rather, from the beginning we were commanded to love each other.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Love means that we live by doing what he commands. We were commanded to live in love, and you have heard this from the beginning.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Many people who deceive others have gone into the world. They refuse to declare that Jesus Christ came in flesh and blood. This is the mark of a deceiver and an antichrist.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Be careful that you don’t destroy what we’ve worked for, but that you receive your full reward.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Everyone who doesn’t continue to teach what Christ taught doesn’t have God. The person who continues to teach what Christ taught has both the Father and the Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If anyone comes to you and doesn’t bring these teachings, don’t take him into your home or even greet him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever greets him shares the evil things he’s doing.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have a lot to write to you. I would prefer not to write a letter. Instead, I hope to visit and talk things over with you personally. Then we will be completely filled with joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The children of your chosen sister greet you.
verses.speaker: Narrator
